notes.body: Hello Amit,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #657956479926796288-93536.     We have received an update from our logistics team. As per the update, your order has been delivered on 13 December 2025,9:58 PM. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,   PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Nikita,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #657081302100283392-19829, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the BONTRESS PRO+ SCALP SERUM | 5% CAPIXYL | 3% REDENSYL | 3% ANAGAIN | 3% PROCAPIL | 60 ML on 14th December 2025. and same ha sbeen picked up on 15 December 2025.     Please note that as the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 business days.     We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Nikita,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your order #657081302100283392-19829, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the BONTRESS PRO+ SCALP SERUM | 5% CAPIXYL | 3% REDENSYL | 3% ANAGAIN | 3% PROCAPIL | 60 ML on 14th December 2025. and same ha sbeen picked up on 15 December 2025.
 
Please note that as the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 business days.
 
We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
 
We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Vijay,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is in regards to the concern raise about your order #658173359789486080-53985.Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that all medicines were packed and delivered to you in proper and good condition as checked with our warehouse team. Your understanding is highly appreciated in this regard.     Please be informed that the update was shared with you after a thorough check.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Vijay,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is in regards to the concern raise about your order #658173359789486080-53985.Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.

As per update received from our team, please be informed that all medicines were packed and delivered to you in proper and good condition as checked with our warehouse team. Also product sold from fresh stock so neither refund is possible nor return will be initiated.

Your understanding is highly appreciated in this regard.
 
Please be informed that the update was shared with you after a thorough check.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Deepak Kumar,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #658414699266605056-25572, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 13th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.     We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Deepak Kumar,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #658414699266605056-25572, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 13th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

This same issue happened, and the wrong item was delivered. We collected the items manually, and the refund of Rs. 1322.44 was made to the Cx bank account. A new order was placed, and the medicines were delivered free of cost. We had credited Rs. 1322.44 to the PharmEasy wallet to place an order for the same.


2. 610096008386125824-77916
FL1170880452
Order Placed - 1st Aug, 07:12 AM
Delivered - 2nd Aug, 08:11 PM
This same issue happened, and the wrong item was delivered. A refund of Rs.  995.95 was made to the Cx bank account. A new order was placed free of cost. We had credited Rs. 1200 to the PharmEasy wallet to place an order for the same. Attempts were made to deliver the order and to collect the wrong items from Cx, but it failed as the Cx was not available at the address. The free-of-cost order was cancelled, and Rs. 1200 was refunded to the PharmEasy wallet. Cx had later used that amount to place an order.
Additionally, we offered Rs. 2000 as compensation and asked Cx to provide the bank details to proceed, which Cx did not agree to, as he was not ready with that amount.

3. Current latest order #656531285027880960-50248
FL1182446824
Order Placed - 7th Dec, 10:29 AM
Delivered - 8th Dec, 04:17 PM

This same issue has happened again. We have now raised a return request.
Amount paid - Rs. 1788.21

Kindly confirm further actions.







Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk

Hi Grievance Team,

notes.body_html:
Hello Jyotsna,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #656907949557710848-11856, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 14th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. 

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Tapas,     Greetings from PharmEasy!   ​   I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine COFSILS ORANGE STRIP OF 10 LOZENGES, GEMCAL PLUS STRIP OF 15 SOFTGEL CAPSULES and GABATOR 100MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS in your order #655938054162026496-28012. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.   I see that an issue was raised for the missing medicine. As checked, the issue is verified and a refund of Rs. 439.84 has been initiated on 13th December 2025. The refund will be credited to your payments source within 3 to 5 working days. Request you to check with your ​Amazon Pay customer care with the help of the ARN number (​P04-8983906-0226134-R021836).  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Tapas,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 
​
I am sorry to know you have not received your ordered medicine COFSILS ORANGE STRIP OF 10 LOZENGES, GEMCAL PLUS STRIP OF 15 SOFTGEL CAPSULES and GABATOR 100MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS in your order #655938054162026496-28012. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.

I see that an issue was raised for the missing medicine. As checked, the issue is verified and a refund of Rs. 439.84 has been initiated on 13th December 2025. The refund will be credited to your payments source within 3 to 5 working days. Request you to check with your ​Amazon Pay customer care with the help of the ARN number (​P04-8983906-0226134-R021836).
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Tejaswini,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I am sorry to hear that you wish to delete your account with PharmEasy. Please note that currently, we do not have a facility to delete the account from our database; however, we can deactivate your account. We will be unable to activate it later, and it will be deactivated permanently.     Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account       Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.     Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:

I am sorry to hear that you wish to delete your account with PharmEasy. Please note that currently, we do not have a facility to delete the account from our database; however, we can deactivate your account. We will be unable to activate it later, and it will be deactivated permanently.

Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Subject: Incorrect Refund Amount Credited – ₹50 Instead of ₹56

Dear PharmEasy Team,

I am writing to inform you that I have received an email regarding a refund
of ₹50, whereas the approved refund amount was ₹56.

This refund is related to my complaint for delayed delivery (Cash on
Delivery order), for which I had raised the issue on 29 November. The short
credit of ₹6 has not been explained, and no justification has been provided
for deducting the amount.

Issue Details:

Expected Refund: ₹56

Refund Intimated: ₹50

Difference Amount: ₹6


Kindly clarify the reason for the deduction and credit the remaining ₹6 to
my PharmEasy wallet at the earliest.

Please resolve this discrepancy immediately and confirm once the full
refund is processed.

In case of no response or correction, I will be constrained to escalate the
matter to higher authorities and consumer grievance platforms.

Sincerely,
Name: Praveen Sharma

-- 


Disclaimer:

This email contains proprietary, business-confidential, 
and/or privileged material. The information contained in this e-mail is 
intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed. If 
you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any 
disclosure, copying, distribution or action in relation to the contents of 
this email is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful and request you to 
permanently delete this message and any attachments herein. You are 
requested to advise the sender, of your receipt of this email by return 
e-mail. The Company and its affiliates rule out any and every liability 
resulting from this or any other electronic transmission.

notes.body: Hello Arya,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   I am sorry to hear that you wish to deactivate your PharmEasy account.   ​   Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP will be shared by you to the team then will go ahead and block the customer's account.      Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Arya,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
I am sorry to hear that you wish to deactivate your PharmEasy account. 
​
Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP will be shared by you to the team then will go ahead and block the customer's account. 
 
Awaiting your response.
 
Regards,
Manisha

If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. notes.body_html:
Hello Arya,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I am sorry to hear that you wish to deactivate your PharmEasy account. 

Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP will be shared by you to the team then will go ahead and block the customer's account. 
 
Awaiting your response.
 
Regards,
Tahera

notes.body: Hello Arya,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     We had written to you asking for more information with reference to the earlier email. However, we have not received any reply from you. Hence, we are closing this case.      For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 08071324888.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.     Regards,  Tahera

We had written to you asking for more information with reference to the earlier email. However, we have not received any reply from you. Hence, we are closing this case.

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
Thank you for showing an interest in working as a partner with us.
 
Please click on the link below and fill in the requisite details:
https://pharmeasy.in/franchisestores
 
Kindly note that once the form is filled request you to kindly wait for 5 business days for the call, as there are certain conditions that our team will need to check before they connect with you to discuss your interest further.

If you do not receive a call or email to take this further, it means that your partner's request has not been considered.

Also, please direct your query to our franchise team. Their email ID is franchisequery@pharmeasy.in, and they can assist you better. Kindly provide them with complete details and a valid contact number so that they can connect with you. Our franchise team will then contact you in case of any suitable prospects.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Joy,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I am sorry to hear that you wish to delete your account with PharmEasy. Please note that currently, we do not have a facility to delete the account from our database; however, we can deactivate your account. We will be unable to activate it later, and it will be deactivated permanently.     Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account       Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.     Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:

Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account  

Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.

Awaiting your earliest response.
